title: (x) Rachmaninoff unicase Didone - Filosofia {Sebastian}

author: R27

comments.content:
[Filosofia Unicase](http://web.archive.org/web/20060511181533/http:/www.emigre.com/dp/getfontpage.php?PFilU.html) by Emigre Graphics, Designed by Zuzana Licko

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/filosofia.png)

Well, I wondered about the ‘Emigre Graphics’ part as well, but Sebastian sure is correct. Quoting [www.emigre.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20060511181533/http:/www.emigre.com/): ‘ _[Copyright © 1995-2006, Emigre Inc. All rights reserved. No portion of this document may be reproduced, copied or in any way reused without written permission from Emigre, Inc. Emigre is a registered trademark of Emigre Graphics.](http://web.archive.org/web/20060511181533/http:/www.emigre.com/)_‘

_( I never noticed that before. Edit-A-Bit: I also just noticed that I actually just ‘reproduced’ that sentence, without a written permission. Sorry. Its all for the good cause of the ‘Typophile Research Department’. :)_

Dav

thanks Dav,

before i made my last post i checked out the Emigre website just to be sure but i guess i should have read the fine print ; )

cheers!
